Rulings.Edison:
Discard 1 card. Add 1 Monster Card from your GY to your hand.
●This effect targets a card in the GY. It is negated by Necrovalley.
●You discard a card for cost.
●If you discard Night Assailant, Makyura the Destructor, or Dandylion their effects activate (in the GY), starting a new chain, even if you retrieve the same card.
Rulings.Tengu:
Discard 1 card. Add 1 Monster Card from your GY to your hand.
●This effect targets a card in the GY. It is negated by Necrovalley.
●You discard a card for cost.
●If you discard Night Assailant, Makyura the Destructor, or Dandylion their effects activate (in the GY), starting a new chain, even if you retrieve the same card.
Rulings.Goat:
●You can select a card discarded by the effect of Monster Reincarnation as a target of the effect of that same Monster Reincarnation (returning the monster to your hand).
●If you discard Night Assailant or Makyura the Destructor their effects activate even if you retrieve the same card.
